title: Preseaon Ranking
body:
Hey guys,

Just a curious thought as I was wondering about how everyone perceives preseason ranking.  I personally prefer it because of two main things;
1. Less pressure
2. Less trolls

I tend to find I do better preseason than during, (notably this one too going from b3 to s3 in a month).
During Last season I was silver V and ended up seeding to B3. I got to Silver promos 5 times during the year, each time losing and dropping all the way to B3 again, due to - trolls, afks, people being bad (including me - not everyone has a good game all the time) and a ton of (i guess) anxiety about the rank match because of the affor mentioned issues.

However post season, I see less afk's, less trolls and I have a generally calming sense of "it's ok".  I also find that preseason I can pick champs that will be strong in that meta before they're banned all the time and get easy wins. I'm not too sure how it impacts seeding for next season, but it certainly makes ranking much easier albeit without any perks of shiny borders and pretty skins.

Whats you thoughts?

replies.body: I find the complete opposite..No one really cares about their rank so pretty much every game has a troll. There's lots of people who got boosted for end of season rewards and everyone is adjusting to pretty massive patches so overall quality goes down. Much more of a lottery than normal season.

Elo inflation. Everyone is going up, everyones elo artificially inflates during pre-season.

Then when actual season starts the true Elo system is put in place and everyone will get a reality check as they are brought back down where they belong.
No, people afk and feed because it's preseason.
